mapper.insert: insert into NOTICEBOARD (N_ID, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, N_EMP_ID, N_DATE) values(nboard.nextval, #{N_TITLE}, #{N_CONTENT},#{N_EMP_ID} , sysdate)
mapper.select: select N_ID, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, N_EMP_ID, N_DATE, N_HIT from NOTICEBOARD where N_ID = #{N_ID}
mapper.update: update NOTICEBOARD set N_TITLE = #{N_TITLE}, N_CONTENT =#{N_CONTENT} where N_ID = #{N_ID}
mapper.select: select N_ID, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, N_EMP_ID, N_DATE, N_HIT from NOTICEBOARD where N_ID > 0 order by N_ID desc, N_DATE desc
select N_ID, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, N_EMP_ID, N_DATE, N_HIT from (select * from NOTICEBOARD ) where rownum >= 0 and rownum <= 10 and N_ID > 0 order by N_ID desc, N_DATE desc
select N_ID, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, N_EMP_ID, N_DATE, N_HIT from NOTICEBOARD where N_ID > 0 order by N_ID desc, N_DATE desc
select count(N_ID) from NOTICEBOARD where N_ID > 0

select N_ID, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, N_EMP_ID, N_DATE, N_HIT from NOTICEBOARD where N_ID > 0
order by N_ID desc
select count(N_ID) from NOTICEBOARD where N_ID > 0
mapper.update: update NOTICEBOARD set N_HIT = N_HIT + 1 where N_ID = #{N_ID}
mapper.insert: insert into NOTICEBOARD_AttACH(FULLNAME, N_ID) values (#{FULLNAME}, NOTI_SEQ.currval)
mapper.select: select FULLNAME from NOTICEBOARD_AttACH where N_ID = #{N_ID} order by N_DATE
